actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from HUD.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to allow newly designated metropolitan cities to retain their former status, permitting a county which was an urban county to retain its status as an urban county.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to allow a unit of local government to defer its classification as a metropolitan city as long as it continues to have its population included in an urban county for purposes of provisions governing community development block grants.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to allow newly designated metropolitan cities to retain their former status, permitting a county which was an urban county to retain its status as an urban county.
